Verses: 1 theerkkadharisigalin Puththirar Elisaavai Nokki: Idho, Naangal Ummudan Kudiyirukkira Indha Idam Engalukku Nerukkamaai Irukkiradhu.
2 naangal Yordhaanmattum Poi Avvidaththil Ovvoruvar Ovvoru Uththiraththai Vetti, Kudiyirukka Ange Engalukku Oru Idaththai Undaakkuvom Endraargal. Adharku Avan: Pongal Endraan.
3 avargalil Oruvan: Neer Dhayavuseydhu Umadhu Adiyaarodekooda Varavendum Endraan. Adharku Avan: Naan Varugiren Endru Solli,
4 avargalodekoodap Ponaan; Avargal Yordhaan Nadhiyaruge Vandha Podhu Marangalai Vettinaargal.
5 oruvan Oru Uththiraththai Vetti Vizhuththugaiyil Kodari Thanneeril Vizhundhadhu; Avan: Aiyo En Aandavane, Adhu Iravalaaga Vaangappattadhe Endru Koovinaan.
6 dhevanudaiya Manushan Adhu Enge Vizhundhadhu Endru Kettaan; Avan Andha Idaththaik Kaanbiththapodhu, Oru Kombai Vetti, Adhai Ange Erindhu, Andha Irumbai Midhakkappanni,
7 adhai Eduththukkol Endraan; Appadiye Avan Than Kaiyai Neetti Adhai Eduththukkondaan.
8 akkaalaththil Seeriyaavin Raajaa Isravelukku Virodhamaai Yuththam Panni, Inna Inna Sthalaththile Paalayamiranguven Endru Than Oozhiyakkaararode Aalosanaipanninaan.
9 aagilum Dhevanudaiya Manushan Isravelin Raajaavinidaththil Aal Anuppi: Inna Idaththukkup Pogaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirum; Seeriyar Ange Iranguvaargal Endru Solla Sonnaan.

10 appozhudhu Isravelin Raajaa Dhevanudaiya Manushan Thannai Echchariththu, Thanakkuk Kuriththuchchonna Sthalaththirku Manusharai Anuppippaarththu Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu, Ippadi Anegandharam Thannaik Kaaththukkondaan.

11 indhak Kaariyaththinimiththam Seeriya Raajaavin Irudhayam Kuzhambi, Avan Than Oozhiyakkaararai Azhaiththu: Nammudaiyavargalil Isravelin Raajaavukku Ulavaayirukkiravan Yaar Endru Neengal Enakku Arivikkamaatteergalaa Endru Kettaan.

12 appozhudhu Avan Oozhiyakkaararil Oruvan: Appadiyillai; En Aandavanaagiya Raajaave, Neer Ummudaiya Palli Araiyile Pesugira Vaarththaigalaiyum Isravelilirukkira Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Elisaa Isravelin Raajaavukku Arivippaan Endraan.
13 appozhudhu Avan: Naan Manusharai Anuppi Avanaip Pidikkumpadi, Neengal Poi Avan Enge Irukkiraan Endru Paarungal Endraan; Avan Thoththaanil Irukkiraan Endru Avanukku Arivikkappattadhu.
14 appozhudhu Avan Ange Kudhiraigalaiyum Radhangalaiyum Balaththa Raanuvaththaiyum Anuppinaan; Avargal Raakkaalaththile Vandhu Pattanaththai Valaindhukondaargal.

15 dhevanudaiya Manushanin Velaikkaaran Adhigaalame Ezhundhu Veliye Purappadugaiyil, Idho, Raanuvamum Kudhiraigalum Radhangalum Pattanaththai Sutrik Kondirukkak Kandaan; Appozhudhu Velaikkaaran Avanai Nokki: Aiyo, En Aandavane, Ennaseyvom Endraan.
16 adharku Avan: Bayappadaadhe; Avargalodirukkiravargalaip Paarkkilum Nammodirukkiravargal Adhigam Endraan.

17 appozhudhu Elisaa Vinnappam Panni: Karththaave, Ivan Paarkkumpadi Ivan Kangalaith Thirandharulum Endraan; Udane Karththar Andha Velaikkaaran Kangalaith Thirandhaar; Idho, Elisaavai Sutrilum Akkinimayamaana Kudhiraigalaalum Radhangalaalum Andha Malai Niraindhirukkiradhai Avan Kandaan.

18 avargal Avanidaththil Varugaiyil, Elisaa Karththarai Nokki Vinnappampanni: Indha Janangalukkuk Kan Mayakkam Undaagumpadi Seyyum Endraan; Elisaavudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye Avargalukkuk Kanmayakkam Undaagumpadi Seydhaar.

19 appozhudhu Elisaa Avargalai Nokki: Idhu Vazhi Alla; Idhu Pattanamum Alla; En Pirage Vaarungal; Neengal Thedugira Manushanidaththil Naan Ungalai Vazhinadaththuven Endru Solli, Avargalai Samaariyaavukku Azhaiththukkonduponaan.

20 avargal Samaariyaavil Vandhapodhu, Elisaa: Karththaave, Ivargal Paarkkumpadikku Ivargal Kangalaith Thirandharulum Endraan; Paarkkumpadikkuk Karththar Avargal Kangalaith Thirakkumpodhu, Idho, Avargal Samaariyaavin Naduve Irundhaargal.
21 isravelin Raajaa Avargalaik Kandapodhu, Elisaavaip Paarththu: En Thagappane, Naan Avargalai Vettip Podalaamaa Endru Kettaan.

22 adharku Avan: Neer Vettavendaam; Neer Ummudaiya Pattayaththaalum, Ummudaiya Villinaalum Siraiyaakkik Kondavargalai Vettugireero? Ivargal Pusiththuk Kudiththu, Thangal Aandavanidaththukkup Pogumpadikku, Appamum Thanneerum Avargalukkedhiril Vaiyum Endraan.

23 appozhudhu Avargalukkup Periya Virundhupanni, Avargal Pusiththuk Kudiththapinbu, Avargalai Anuppivittaan; Avargal Thangal Aandavanidaththukkup Poivittaargal; Seeriyarin Thandugal Isravel Dhesaththile Appuram Varavillai.
24 idharkuppinbu Seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Penaadhaath Than Raanuvaththaiyellaam Koottikkonduvandhu Samaariyaavai Mutrikkaipottaan.

25 adhinaal Samaariyaavile Kodiya Panjamundaayitru; Oru Kazhudhaith Thalai Enbadhu Vellikkaasukkum, Puraakkalukkup Podugira Kaarpadi Payaru Aindhu Vellikkaasukkum Virkappadumattum Adhai Mutrikkaipottaargal.
26 isravelin Raajaa Alangaththin Mel Nadandhupogaiyil, Oru Sthree Avanaippaarththuk Kooppittu, Raajaavaagiya En Aandavane, Ratchiyum Endraal.
27 adharku Avan: Karththar Unnai Ratchikkaadhirundhaal Naan Edhilirundhu Eduththu Unnai Ratchikkalaam? Kalanjiyaththilirundhaa, Aalaiyilirundhaa Endru Solli,
28 raajaa Pinnaiyum Avalaip Paarththu: Unakku Ennavendum Endru Kettaan. Adharku Aval: Indha Sthree Ennai Nokki: Un Maganaith Thaa, Avanai Indru Thinbom; Naalaikku En Maganaith Thinbom Endraal.
29 appadiye En Maganai Aakkith Thindrom; Marunaalil Naan Ivalai Nokki: Naam Un Maganaith Thinna Avanaith Thaa Endren; Aval Than Maganai Oliththuvittaal Endraal.

30 andha Sthreeyin Vaarththaigalai Raajaa Kettavudane, Alangaththinmel Nadandhupogira Avan Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondaan; Avan Ulle Than Sareeraththinmel Rattu Uduththiyirukkiradhai Janangal Kandaargal.
31 avan: Saappaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Elisaavin Thalai Indraikku Avanmel Irundhaal, Dhevan Adharku Sariyaagavum Adharku Adhigamaagavum Enakku Seyyakkadavar Endru Sonnaan.

32 elisaa Than Veettil Utkaarndhirundhaan; Moopparum Avanodu Utkaarndhirundhaargal. Appozhudhu Raajaa: Oru Manushanaith Thanakku Munne Anuppinaan; Indha Aal Elisaavinidaththukku Varumunne, Avan Andha Moopparai Nokki: En Thalaiyai Vaanga, Andhak Kolaipaadhaganudaiya Magan Aal Anuppinaan; Paarththeergalaa? Andha Aal Varumpodhu, Neengal Avanai Ulle Varavottaamal Kadhavaip Poottippodungal; Avanukkup Pinnaaga Avan Aandavanudaiya Kaalin Saththam Ketkiradhu Allavaa Endraan.

33 avargalode Avan Pesikkondirukkaiyil, Andha Aal Avanidaththil Vandhu: Idho, Indhap Pollaappu Karththaraal Undaanadhu; Naan Inikkarththarukkaagak Kaaththirukka Vendiyadhu Enna Endru Raajaa Sollugiraar Endraan.
